title: Syncovery Pro Enterprise 7.53 Build 367  (Install + Portable)
description:
Syncovery Pro Enterprise 7.53 Build 367  (Install + Portable) + Serial

*** About this release

Release date: 20/06/2016
Versions: x86/x64
Language: english
OS : Windows 2K/XP/2003/Vista/7/8/10
Install: run installer, launch application, go to help and enter registration details from text file, block internet access
Portable: registered, unpack and run the desired version (x86/x64) of Syncovery.exe, block internet access

* New in version 7.53
- allows to specify different speed limits on various hours every day or weekend. See in the profile under Files->More: Speed Limit: Advanced.
- â€œProcess Security and Sharesâ€ has a new checkmark: Strip unknown SIDs from file shares. This will not strip them from the source side, but creates shares on the destination with only known SIDs (and no orphaned SIDs from deleted user accounts)
- fixes exporting to INI file which was partly broken in the last few versions 

*** About Syncovery Pro Enterprise

Back up your data and synchronize PCs, Macs, servers, notebooks, and online storage space.

You can set up as many different jobs as you need and run them manually or using the scheduler.
Syncovery works with local hard drives, network drives and any other mounted volumes.
In addition, it comes with support for FTP, SSH, HTTP, WebDAV, Amazon S3, Google Drive, Microsoft Azure, SugarSync, box.net and many other cloud storage providers.
You can use ZIP compression and data encryption.
On Windows, the scheduler can run as a service â€“ without users having to log on.
There are powerful synchronization modes, including Standard Copying, Exact Mirror, and SmartTracking.

Syncovery features a carefully designed GUI to make it an extremely versatile synchronizing and backup tool.
The wealth of features fulfills all requirements that users typically have, while still being easy to use.

Homepage https://www.syncovery.com/
